problem_text_cn: 如图,已知:Rt△ABC的斜边AB=13cm,一条直角边AC=5cm,以直线BC为轴旋转一周得一个圆锥,则这个圆锥的表面积为()cm2．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the hypotenuse AB = N_0 of Rt△ABC, the leg AC = N_1, and the straight line BC is taken as the axis to make a cone by one revolution, then the surface area of ​​the cone is ()
